title: Share Files with a Freelancer
description: An editor needs to securely share background documents and interview transcripts with a freelance reporter who is not on the internal network.

tasks.description: Create a secure, password-protected folder on a cloud sharing service.
Upload the relevant documents to the folder.
Share the link to the folder with the freelancer and send the password in a separate, secure message (e.g., encrypted text).
tasks.expected_outcome: The freelancer receives secure access to the necessary files.
